member.name: T:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions
member.summary: Pubblic static class which extents the .NET class String

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.ToMd5Hash(System.String)
member.param: string for converting to MD5 Hash

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.ToBoolean(System.String)
member.summary: Checks а string if has a value:"true", "ok", "yes", "1", "да"

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.ToShort(System.String)
member.summary: Converts the input string to 16-bit signed integer if it is possible.
member.returns: Returns 16-bit signed integer or 0 if it is not successful.

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.ToInteger(System.String)
member.summary: Converts the input string to 32-bit signed integer if it is possible.
member.returns: Returns 32-bit signed integer or 0 if it is not successful.

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.ToLong(System.String)
member.summary: Converts the input string to 64-bit signed integer if it is possible.
member.returns: Returns 64-bit signed integer or 0 if it is not successful.

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.ToDateTime(System.String)
member.summary: Converts the input string to date and time using DateTime class in .NET if it is possible.
member.returns: DateTime value or date: 01.01.0001 00:00:00 if it is not successfull.

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.CapitalizeFirstLetter(System.String)
member.summary: Capitalize the first letter of a string.
member.returns: Returns capitalized first letter.If the string is empty or null returns the input.

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.GetStringBetween(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Finds a string bitween two other strings.
member.param: An input string where the needed string is.
member.returns: Returns a string between the first and the last strings. If the first or the last string does not exist in the range from starting postion to the the end of the input string the return result is empty string.

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.ConvertCyrillicToLatinLetters(System.String)
member.summary: Converts string with cyrilic letters to their oficial latin rapresentation.
member.returns: Returns the input string with latin letters.

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.ConvertLatinToCyrillicKeyboard(System.String)
member.summary: Converts string with latin letters to their oficial cyrilic rapresentation.
member.returns: Returns the input string with cyliric letters.

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.ToValidUsername(System.String)
member.summary: Validates user name for permitted symbols.The name should have only letters or digits.
member.returns: Returns string without invalid chars and white spaces.

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.ToValidLatinFileName(System.String)
member.summary: Converts file name to valid latin name.
member.returns: Returns a string coverted to latin letters without invalid chars or white spaces.

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.GetFirstCharacters(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets a sequence of the first chars from a string.
member.param: the number of the chars for return
member.returns: Returns string of chars depending from the charCount parameter. If charCount parameter is 0 returns empty string.

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.GetFileExtension(System.String)
member.summary: Gets the file extention of a file name represened as string.
member.returns: Returns the file extention as a string.If file name is empty string or null returns empty string

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.ToContentType(System.String)
member.summary: Finds the content type of a file extension represented as a string.
member.returns: Returns content type as a string. If file extention is not found returns : "application/octet-stream". (ex: "image/jpeg","application/msword").

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.ToByteArray(System.String)
member.summary: Finds the decimal representation of the chars of a string using ASCII table.
member.returns: Returns byte array for each char from the input string.
